room_title: Escape room "The Cellar" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: We did the Cellar and loved it! The props and design were amazing compared to the others Iâ€™ve been to. I liked that you had to get through multiple rooms. However, it was a little difficult trying to fit 10 people in these rooms. I only wish that we had a little more guidance in the beginning (the lady talked really fast). I would definitely come back to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Cellar" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: Overall this escape room experience was awesome! The props, set design, and puzzles are all meticulously executed. However, the rooms show some serious degeneration and destruction from other clients who try to muscle open doors, locks, and other props. Lots of sticky padlocks, paint rubbed off of things, props ripped open, etc. These were time-consuming and frustrating for the gamers. It was difficult to hear the game operator at times.Also, this (The Cellar Experience) was more physically demanding than other escape rooms I have been too. Do not wear nice clothes; my jeans were pretty much ruined from crawling through dirty ducts on dirty concrete floors.Again, overall an amazing game play experience. Some cleaning and upkeep would make this a 5-Star experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Cellar" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: Loved It! The Cellar escape was a lot of fun! Excellent props, authentic environment. Awesome staff! We wanted to come right back in and try another room!

room_title: Escape room "The Cellar" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: We had a great time in the Cellar Escape Room! The staff made the experience exciting and the puzzles were a blast to figure out! Although we did not make it out "alive" it was very fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Cellar" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: Had a great time! We did The Celler and there was so much to figure out that everyone was always doing something. Everything was done perfectly! I definitely recommend.
